divs: Sighting DetailsI was feeding my dogs when i noticed strange lights in the sky. at first I thaught it was a airplane but then I noticed the shape.A sphere on fire. when i got don feeding i noticed that they had moved to the other side of the sky and was getting closer. After I went into my house I never saw it again.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Baytown
There were no other sightings in Baytown on or around November 28th 2012
Summary: it was like a mini sun
